page.title: 02DALRY-LIFE IN THE COUNTRY
page.content: In the country life is not as boring as it may sound. In the summer hay is being made. In winter cows are calving and in spring the sheep are lambing. I live outside Dalry. Anything I need I either go to Saltcoats or Irvine. I work on a farm. I live in a family of 8,4 brothers,one sister and my mum and dad. Three of my brothers work on farms,one on the other side of Dalry, one in Dunoon and one on the same farm as myself. My other brother works as a baker in Dalry.My sister is married and lives in Glasgow. My mum is a housewife and my dad works in Glasgow. We have two dogs and a cat. Unlike in the town,where neighbours can keep an eye on your house,in the country your nearest neighbour maybe a mile away. The cat is to keep out mice. I enjoy living in the country. It gives me a sense of freedom.
